title: Choose schedule type
description: After you choose, you can create a pay schedule for each group.

single.label: Everyone on one schedule
single.description: Choose one pay schedule for all your employees

hourlySalaried.label: By compensation type
hourlySalaried.description: Assign separate pay schedules to hourly and salaried employees

byEmployee.label: By employee
byEmployee.description: Assign employees to pay schedules individually. Use this for schedules based on location, owner, status or other qualifiers.

byDepartment.label: By department
byDepartment.description: Assign pay schedules to departments. Use this to pay Sales or other commission-based department separately.
